trans-unit.source: Choosing between .NET Core and .NET Framework for server apps
trans-unit.target: 針對伺服器應用程式在 .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 之間進行選擇

trans-unit.source: A guide on which flavor of .NET you should consider when building a server app in .NET.
trans-unit.target: 本指南說明您在 .NET 中建置伺服器應用程式時應考量要使用哪種 .NET 類別。

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core, .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core, .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: Choosing between .NET Core and .NET Framework for server apps
trans-unit.target: 針對伺服器應用程式在 .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 之間進行選擇

trans-unit.source: There are two supported choices of runtime for building server-side applications with .NET: .NET Framework and .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個支援的執行階段選項，可使用 .NET 來建置伺服器端應用程式：.NET Framework 及.NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Both share a lot of the same .NET platform components and you can share code across the two.
trans-unit.target: 這兩者共用許多相同的 .NET 平台元件，而您可以在這兩者間共用程式碼。

trans-unit.source: However, there are fundamental differences between the two and your choice will depend on what you want to accomplish.
trans-unit.target: 不過，兩者間有一些基本差異，而您的選擇取決於您想要完成的目標。

trans-unit.source: This article provides guidance on when to use each.
trans-unit.target: 本文提供有關每一個選項使用時機的指引。

trans-unit.source: You should use .NET Core for your server application when:
trans-unit.target: 在下列情況中，您應該針對伺服器應用程式使用 .NET Core：

trans-unit.source: You have cross-platform needs.
trans-unit.target: 您有跨平台需求。

trans-unit.source: You are targeting microservices.
trans-unit.target: 您的目標為微服務。

trans-unit.source: You are using Docker containers.
trans-unit.target: 您正在使用 Docker 容器。

trans-unit.source: You need high performance and scalable systems.
trans-unit.target: 您需要高效能且可調整的系統。

trans-unit.source: You need side by side of .NET versions by application.
trans-unit.target: 您需要依應用程式讓 .NET 版本並存。

trans-unit.source: You should use .NET Framework for your server application when:
trans-unit.target: 在下列情況中，您應該針對伺服器應用程式使用 .NET Framework：

trans-unit.source: Your application currently uses .NET Framework (recommendation is to extend instead of migrating)
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式目前使用的是 .NET Framework (建議為擴充，而不是移轉)

trans-unit.source: You need to use third-party .NET libraries or NuGet packages not available for .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 您需要使用的協力廠商 .NET 程式庫或 NuGet 套件不適用 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: You need to use .NET technologies that are not available for .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 您需要使用的 .NET 技術不適用 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: You need to use a platform that doesn’t support .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 您需要使用不支援 .NET Core 的平台。

trans-unit.source: When to choose .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 選擇 .NET Core 的時機

trans-unit.source: The following is a more detailed explanation of the previously-stated reasons for picking .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 以下將更詳盡說明先前所述之挑選 .NET Core 的理由。

trans-unit.source: Cross-platform needs
trans-unit.target: 跨平台需求

trans-unit.source: Clearly, if your goal is to have an application (web/service) that should be able to run across platforms (Windows, Linux and macOS), the best choice is to use .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 很明顯地，如果您的目標是讓應用程式 (Web/服務) 應該能夠跨平台 (Windows、Linux 和 macOS) 執行，最好的選擇就是使用 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core also supports the previously-mentioned operating systems as your development workstation.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 也支援先前所述的作業系統做為您的開發工作站。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio provides an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Windows.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 提供適用於 Windows 的整合式開發環境 (IDE)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use Visual Studio Code on macOS, Linux and Windows which fully support .NET Core, including IntelliSense and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在 macOS、Linux 和 Windows 上使用 Visual Studio 程式碼，其完全支援 .NET Core (包括 IntelliSense 和偵錯)。

trans-unit.source: You can also target .NET Core with most third-party editors like Sublime, Emacs, VI and can get editor IntelliSense using the open source [Omnisharp](http://www.omnisharp.net/) project.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以使用大多數的協力廠商編輯器 (例如 Sublime、Emacs、VI) 來將目標設定為 .NET Core，而且可以使用開放原始碼的 [Omnisharp](http://www.omnisharp.net/) 專案來取得編輯器 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: You can also avoid any code editor and directly use the .NET Core command-line tools, available forall supported platforms.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以避免使用任何程式碼編輯器，並直接使用 .NET Core 的命令列工具 (適用於所有支援的平台)。

trans-unit.source: Microservices architecture
trans-unit.target: 微服務架構

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is the best candidate if you are embracing a microservices oriented system composed of multiple independent, dynamically scalable, stateful or stateless microservices.
trans-unit.target: 如果您擁有微服務導向的系統，該系統是由多個獨立、可動態擴充、具狀態或無狀態的微服務所組成，則 .NET Core 是最佳候選項目。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is lightweight and its API surface can be minimized to the scope of the microservice.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 是輕量型的，而且可將其 API 介面最小化到微服務的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A microservices architecture also allows you to mix technologies across a service boundary, enabling a gradual embrace of .NET Core for new microservices that live in conjunction with other microservices or services developed with .NET Framework, Java, Ruby, or other monolithic technologies.
trans-unit.target: 微服務架構也可讓您跨越服務界限混用技術，從而能夠基於新的微服務逐漸接受 .NET Core，新的微服務可以與利用 .NET Framework、Java、Ruby 或其他整合型技術所開發的其他微服務或服務同時存留。

trans-unit.source: The infrastructure platforms you could use are many.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的基礎結構平台有很多。

trans-unit.source: For large and complex microservice systems, you can use [Azure Service Fabric](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/service-fabric/).
trans-unit.target: 對於大型且複雜的微服務系統，您可以使用 [Azure Service Fabric](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/service-fabric/)。

trans-unit.source: For stateless microservices you can also use other products like [Azure App Service](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/app-service/).
trans-unit.target: 針對無狀態的微服務，您也可以使用其他像是 [Azure App Service](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/app-service/) 的產品。

trans-unit.source: Microservices alternatives based on Docker also fit any kind of microservices approach, as explained next.
trans-unit.target: 以 Docker 為依據的微服務替代方案也符合任何一種微服務方法，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: All these platforms support .NET Core and make them ideal for hosting your microservices.
trans-unit.target: 所有的這些平台均支援 .NET Core，並使其更適合用來裝載您的微服務。

trans-unit.source: Containers
trans-unit.target: 容器

trans-unit.source: Containers are commonly used in conjunction with a microservices architecture, although they can also be used to containerize web apps or services which follow any architectural pattern.
trans-unit.target: 儘管容器也可以用來將 Web 應用程式或服務裝入容器中 (其會遵循任何架構模式)，但它們通常會與微服務架構搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: You will be able to use the .NET Framework for Windows containers, but the modularity and lightweight nature of .NET Core makes it perfect for containers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用適用於 Windows 的 .NET Framework容器，但是 .NET Core 的模組化和輕量型性質可使容器更加完美。

trans-unit.source: When creating and deploying a container the size of its image is far smaller with .NET Core than .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 建立和部署容器時，使用 .NET Core 的映像大小遠小於 .NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: Because it is cross-platform, you can deploy server apps to Linux Docker containers, for example.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，因為它是跨平台的，您可以將伺服器應用程式部署到 Linux Docker 容器。

trans-unit.source: You can then host your Docker containers in your own Linux or Windows infrastructure, or use a cloud service such as [Azure Container Service](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/container-service/) which can manage, orchestrate and scale your container-based application in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可在自己的 Linux 或 Windows 基礎結構中裝載 Docker 容器，或使用雲端服務 (例如 [Azure Container Service](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/container-service/))，其可在雲端中管理、協調及調整您的容器型應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A need for high performance and scalable systems
trans-unit.target: 需要高效能且可調整的系統

trans-unit.source: When your system needs the best possible performance and scalability, .NET Core and ASP.NET Core are your best options.
trans-unit.target: 當您的系統需要最佳效能和延展性時，.NET Core 和 ASP.NET Core 就是最好的選擇。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Core outperforms ASP.NET by a factor of 10, and it leads other popular industry technologies for microservices such as Java servlets, Go and node.js.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Core 的功能勝過 ASP.NET 10 倍，並且在像 Java servlets、Go 和 node.js 等微服務領域中領先其他熱門的業界技術。

trans-unit.source: This is especially relevant for microservices architectures, where you could have hundreds of microservices running.
trans-unit.target: 這對於微服務架構特別重要，您可以在其中執行數百個微服務。

trans-unit.source: With ASP.NET Core you’d be able to run your system with a much lower number of servers/VMs, ultimately saving costs in infrastructure and hosting.
trans-unit.target: 透過 ASP.NET Core，您就能使用較低數目的服務/VM 來執行系統，最終能省下基礎結構與裝載的相關成本。

trans-unit.source: A need for side by side of .NET versions per application level
trans-unit.target: 需要針對每個應用程式層級並存各個 .NET 版本

trans-unit.source: If you want to be able to install applications with dependencies on different versions of frameworks in .NET, you need to use .NET Core, which provides 100% side-by-side.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要能夠在 .NET 的各種架構版本上安裝具有相依性的應用程式，您需要使用 .NET Core，以提供 100% 的並存。

trans-unit.source: Easy side-by-side installation of different versions of .NET Core on the same machine allows you to have multiple services on the same server, each of them on its own version of .NET Core, eliminating risks and saving money in application upgrades and IT operations.
trans-unit.target: 在同一部電腦上輕易並存安裝不同版本的 .NET Core，可讓您在相同伺服器上擁有多個服務，每個均位於它自己的 .NET Core 版本上，以消除有關應用程式升級和 IT 操作人員的風險並節省相關開支。

trans-unit.source: When to choose .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 選擇 .NET Framework 的時機

trans-unit.source: While .NET Core offers significant benefits for new applications and application patterns, the .NET Framework will continue to be the natural choice for many existing scenarios and as such, it won’t be replaced by .NET Core for all server applications.
trans-unit.target: 儘管 .NET Core 可為新的應用程式和應用程式模式提供顯著的優點，但 .NET Framework 仍將持續為許多現有案例的首選，也就是 .NET Core 將不會取代它來用於所有的伺服器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Current .NET Framework applications
trans-unit.target: 目前的 .NET Framework 應用程式

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you won’t need to migrate your existing applications to .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 在大多數的情況中，您不需將現有的應用程式移轉到 .NET Core，

trans-unit.source: Instead, a recommended approach is to use .NET Core as you extend an existing application, such as writing a new web service in ASP.NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 而是建議您在擴充現有的應用程式時使用 .NET Core，例如，在 ASP.NET Core 中寫入新的 Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: A need to use third-party .NET libraries or NuGet packages not available for .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 需要使用的協力廠商的 .NET 程式庫或 NuGet 套件不適用 .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Libraries are quickly embracing .NET Standard, which enables sharing code across all .NET flavors including .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 程式庫會快速採行 .NET 標準，以便跨所有 .NET 類別 (包括 .NET Core) 共用程式碼。

trans-unit.source: With .NET Standard 2.0 this will be even easier, as the .NET Core API surface will become significantly bigger and .NET Core applications can directly use existing .NET Framework libraries.
trans-unit.target: 透過 .NET 標準 2.0，這甚至更加簡單，因為 .NET Core API 介面將明顯變大，而 .NET Core 應用程式可以直接使用現有的 .NET Framework 程式庫。

trans-unit.source: This transition won’t be immediate, though, so we recommend checking the specific libraries required by your application before making a decision one way or another.
trans-unit.target: 但此轉換不是即時的，因此我們建議您先檢查應用程式所需的特定程式庫，然後再以其他方式進行決策。

trans-unit.source: A need to use .NET technologies not available for .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 需要使用的 .NET 技術不適用 .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Some .NET Framework technologies are not available in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 某些 .NET Framework 技術無法在 .NET Core 中使用。

trans-unit.source: Some of them will be available in later .NET Core releases, but others don’t apply to the new application patterns targeted by .NET Core and may never be available.
trans-unit.target: 這其中有一些可在更新的 .NET Core 版本中使用，但其他的則不適用於由 .NET Core 設為目標的應用程式模式，且可能永遠無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the most common technologies not found in .NET Core 1.0:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單顯示 .NET Core 1.0 中找不到的最常見技術：

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web Forms applications: ASP.NET Web Forms is only available on the .NET Framework, so you cannot use ASP.NET Core / .NET Core for this scenario.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web Form 應用程式：ASP.NET Web Form 僅適用於 .NET Framework，因此您無法針對此案例使用 ASP.NET Core /.NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Currently there are no plans to bring ASP.NET Web Forms to .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 目前並未規劃將 ASP.NET Web Form 帶入 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web Pages applications: ASP.NET Web Pages are not included in ASP.NET Core 1.0, although it is planned to be included in a future release as explained in the [.NET Core roadmap](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Roadmap).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web Pages 應用程式：雖然已規劃將其隨附於未來版本中 (如 [.NET Core 藍圖](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Roadmap)所述)，但 ASP.NET Core 1.0 中並未隨附 ASP.NET Web Pages。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET SignalR server/client implementation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET SignalR 伺服器/用戶端實作。

trans-unit.source: At .NET Core 1.0 release timeframe (June 2016), ASP.NET SignalR is not available for ASP.NET Core (neither client or server), although it is planned to be included in a future release as explained in the [.NET Core roadmap](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Roadmap).
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Core 1.0 版本發行時程 (2016 年 6 月) 中，儘管已規劃要將其隨附於未來版本中 (如 [.NET Core 藍圖](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Roadmap)所述)，但 ASP.NET SignalR 不適用於 ASP.NET Core (不論是用戶端或伺服器)。

trans-unit.source: Preview state is available at the [Server-side](https://github.com/aspnet/SignalR-Server) and [Client Library](https://github.com/aspnet/SignalR-Client-Net) GitHub repositories.
trans-unit.target: 預覽狀態適用於[伺服器端](https://github.com/aspnet/SignalR-Server)和[用戶端程式庫](https://github.com/aspnet/SignalR-Client-Net) GitHub 儲存機制。

trans-unit.source: WCF services implementation.
trans-unit.target: WCF 服務實作。

trans-unit.source: Even when there’s a [WCF-Client library](https://github.com/dotnet/wcf) to consume WCF services from .NET Core, as of June 2016, WCF server implementation is only available on the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 即使已有 [WCF 用戶端程式庫](https://github.com/dotnet/wcf) 可從 .NET Core 使用 WCF 服務，但截至 2016 年 6 月，WCF 伺服器實作還是只能在 .NET Framework 上使用。

trans-unit.source: This scenario is not part of the current plan for .NET Core but it’s being considered for the future.
trans-unit.target: 此案例不是 .NET Core 目前計劃的一部分，但未來會納入考慮。

trans-unit.source: Workflow related services: Windows Workflow Foundation (WF), Workflow Services (WCF + WF in a single service) and WCF Data Services (formerly known as “ADO.NET Data Services”) are only available on the .NET Framework and there are no plans to bring them to .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程相關的服務︰Windows Workflow Foundation (WF)、工作流程服務 (WCF + 單一服務中的 WF) 和 WCF Data Services (先前稱為 "ADO.NET Data Services") 僅適用於 .NET Framework，目前並未計劃將其帶入 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Language support: Visual Basic and F# don’t currently have tooling support .NET Core, but both will be supported in Visual Studio 2017 and later versions of Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 語言支援︰Visual Basic 和 F# 目前並未擁有任何支援 .NET Core 的工具，但將於 Visual Studio 2017 和更新版本的 Visual Studio 中支援這兩者。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the official roadmap, there are other frameworks to be ported to .NET Core - For a full list, take a look at CoreFX issues marked as [port-to-core](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Aport-to-core).
trans-unit.target: 除了官方藍圖，還有一些其他要移植到 .NET Core 的架構 - 如需完整清單，請參閱標記為 [port-to-core](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Aport-to-core) 的 CoreFX 問題。

trans-unit.source: Please note that this list doesn’t represent a commitment from Microsoft to bring those components to .NET Core — they are simply capturing the desire from the community to do so.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這份清單並不代表 Microsoft 承諾要將這些元件帶入 .NET Core - 它們只是代表社群的期望。

trans-unit.source: That being said, if you care about any of the components listed above, consider participating in the discussions on GitHub so that your voice can be heard.
trans-unit.target: 話雖如此，如果您關心上方所列的任何元件，請考慮參與 GitHub 上的討論，讓我們可以聽到您的心聲。

trans-unit.source: And if you think something is missing, please [file a new issue in the CoreFX repository](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/new).
trans-unit.target: 如果您認為缺少了什麼，請[在 CoreFX 儲存機制中提問新的問題](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/new)。

trans-unit.source: A need to use a platform that doesn’t support .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 必須使用不支援 .NET Core 的平台

trans-unit.source: Some Microsoft or third-party platforms don’t support .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 某些 Microsoft 或協力廠商平台不支援 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: For example, some Azure services such as Service Fabric Stateful Reliable Services and Service Fabric Reliable Actors require .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些 Azure 服務 (例如 Service Fabric 具狀態可靠服務和 Service Fabric Reliable Actors) 需要 .NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: Some other services provide an SDK not yet available for consumption on .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 部分其他服務提供尚無法在 .NET Core 上使用的 SDK。

trans-unit.source: This is a transitional circumstance, as all of Azure services use .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 這是過渡期，因為所有的 Azure 服務都會使用 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: In the meantime, you can always use the equivalent REST API instead of the client SDK.
trans-unit.target: 在此同時，您永遠都能使用對等的 REST API，而非用戶端 SDK。

trans-unit.source: Further resources
trans-unit.target: 其他資源

trans-unit.source: [.NET Core Guide](../core/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core 指南](../core/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [Porting from .NET Framework to .NET Core](../core/porting/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [從 .NET Framework 移植到 .NET Core](../core/porting/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [.NET Framework on Docker Guide](../framework/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [Docker 上的 .NET Framework 指南](../framework/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [.NET Components Overview](components.md)
trans-unit.target: [.NET 偵錯概觀](components.md)
